nodes.text: Totor's Party Kave was a sail barge, that was used as a floating nightclub on the moon Nar Shaddaa.

During the time of the Clone Wars, the Human Korlana Toryn visited the Kave, along with her E-3PO droid. The heroes of Cularin traveled there to meet with her, but the barge was then attacked by a group of mercenaries, who hoped to collect a bounty that had been posted on the heroes. The Kave then crashed, killing everyone aboard it, apart from Toryn and the heroes.
